content.h1: Lawyers Serving Raleigh, Charlotte and Smithfield, NC
content.heroSection:
Lawyers Serving Raleigh, Charlotte and Smithfield, NC

Attorneys in Wake County for Immigration, Personal Injury, and Criminal Defense Matters

At the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, our attorneys have helped many people in Wake County, Johnston County, and the surrounding areas with their most challenging legal matters. We understand that the lawyer and law firm that you choose to help you can make a difference in the outcome of your case. With more than 35 years of combined legal experience, we know what it is at stake, and we know how to get results in a wide range of practice areas. If you are facing a difficult situation, we are ready to put our experience and our client-focused approach to work for you and your family.

Johnston County Immigration Lawyers

Foreign nationals from around the world come to the United States for a variety of reasons. Many such individuals come with the intention of building a new life for themselves and their loved ones. At the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, we offer skilled guidance in a full range of immigration matters, including but not limited to:

  • Family-based immigration and family visas
  • Appeals of visa denials
  • Waivers of inadmissibility
  • Green cards
  • Adjustment of status
  • Domestic violence and crime victim visas
  • Citizenship through naturalization
  • Asylum and refugees
  • Deportation and removal defense

Our attorneys believe that the United States is truly a land of opportunity, and we will do our very best to help your family enjoy all of the benefits that our country has to offer.

Personal Injury and Workersâ€™ Compensation

At the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, we know how devastating it can be when you are injured in any type of accident. In a matter of moments, your life and your plans for the future can be turned completely upside down. The good news is that our attorneys understand what you are going through, and we are committed to helping you seek full compensation for your injuries.

Our lawyers are prepared to provide the guidance and representation you need when you are pursuing damages related to:

  • Car accidents
  • Truck accidents
  • Motorcycle accidents
  • Pedestrian accidents
  • Drunk driving accidents
  • Accidents involving boats or personal watercraft
  • Bus, train, and mass transit accidents
  • Bicycle accidents
  • Premises liability accidents

If your injury occurred in the course of doing your job, we are also equipped to assist you in navigating the North Carolina workersâ€™ compensation system.

The skilled lawyers at our firm understand the tactics and techniques that insurers often use to minimize their financial ability, and we know how to counter them. We will not be intimidated or fooled into accepting lowball settlements that fail to meet your needs. Instead, we will continue to fight for you until you get the compensation you need to start putting your life back together.

Charlotte Criminal Defense Attorneys

North Carolina maintains some of the strictest criminal laws in the country. If you or someone you love has been charged with a crime, you could be facing severe penalties for a conviction. Such penalties often include jail or prison time, hefty fines, and a record that could follow you for the rest of your life.

At the Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC, our criminal defense team has helped many clients obtain favorable outcomes in all types of criminal cases, including but not limited to:

  • Driving while impaired (DWI)
  • Drug crimes
  • Theft, also known as larceny
  • Domestic violence
  • Violent crimes
  • White-collar crimes
  • Weapons offenses
  • Probation violations
  • Traffic offenses

No matter how serious the charges against you may be, you can depend on us to assist you in building an aggressive, responsible defense. Our goal in every case to help you avoid a conviction if possible and to minimize the negative effects on your future.

Schedule a Free Consultation

For more information about our firm, or to schedule your free, confidential consultation, contact our office. Call 1-844-YO-PELEO or 919-989-3000 for an appointment today. The Vasquez Law Firm, PLLC serves clients in Raleigh, Charlotte, Smithfield, Johnston County, Mecklenburg County, Wake County, and the surrounding areas. Hablamos Espanol.

Practice Areas

  • Immigration Attorneys
  • Personal Injury Attorneys
  • Workersâ€™ Compensation Attorneys
  • Criminal Defense Attorneys
  • Family Law Attorneys

mainEntity.name: How long does the immigration process take?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration timelines vary greatly depending on your case type. Green card applications can take 8-33 months, while citizenship typically takes 8-12 months. Contact Vasquez Law Firm for a personalized timeline assessment.

mainEntity.name: Do I need an immigration lawyer?

acceptedAnswer.text: While not required, an immigration lawyer significantly improves your chances of success. Immigration law is complex and constantly changing. Our attorneys at Vasquez Law Firm ensure your application is complete and accurate.

mainEntity.name: How much does an immigration lawyer cost in Charlotte?

acceptedAnswer.text: Immigration attorney fees vary by case complexity. Vasquez Law Firm offers competitive rates and payment plans. Call 1-844-YO-PELEO for a free consultation and fee quote.

optimizedContent:
[object Object]

## Serving Charlotte and Surrounding Areas
Vasquez Law Firm proudly serves clients throughout Charlotte, Mecklenburg County, and the greater North Carolina area. With offices conveniently located in Charlotte, we're here to help with all your legal needs.


## Why Choose Vasquez Law Firm?
- **Experienced Attorneys**: Over 20 years of combined legal experience
- **Bilingual Services**: We speak English and Spanish
- **Free Consultation**: Call 1-844-YO-PELEO today
- **Proven Results**: Hundreds of satisfied clients
- **24/7 Availability**: We're here when you need us

cta.urgency: Don't wait - immigration laws are changing. Call now!
